snippet.title: 【Nintendo Switch】Livestream: Escape from Hotel Izanami  Teaser Trailer -ENG-
snippet.description:
In this side-scrolling action-adventure game, you'll need to scour the inside of an abandoned hotel, looking for clues to solve the mystery of the hotel and ensure your escape from a mysterious, murderous mascot intent to kill. 

【CHARACTER】
・Mio Ikoma　(CV:Haruka Yamazaki）
・Nana Sakurai　(CV:Asuka Nishi）
・Azusa Shiraishi   (CV:Satsumi Matsuda）

【Spec】
Game Title: Livestream: Escape from Hotel Izanami
Date on Sale: April 15th, 2021
Platform: Nintendo Switch
Genre: Survival Horror Action Adventure
Price: $19.99
Supported Number of Players: 1
Supported Languages: Japanese, English, Chinese Traditional, Chinese Simplified
VOICE: Japanese
official website: https://qureate.net/haishin/en/

Character Design: Waon Inui
Scenario: C-Garden,Inc.
Planner/Producer: Yujiro Usuda

Get the latest updates on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/qureate​
​
©2021 qureate
